dict.acceptation: 傍晚；黄昏；晚会；晚年，衰退期，末期；
在晚上的；为晚上的；晚上用的；

sent.orig: In the evening, he visited his friends and he had a good supper that evening.
sent.trans: 晚上，他去看望他的朋友们，那天晚上他还吃了一顿很好的晚餐。

sent.orig: 'Good-evening, Dance,'says the doctor, with a nod. 'And good-evening to you, friend Jim.
sent.trans: “晚上好，丹斯先生。”大夫点点头说，“晚上好，吉姆小朋友。

sent.orig: In yurts to eat dinner, the evening campfire in the evening kindling, and yurts to live.
sent.trans: 晚餐在蒙古包吃，傍晚点燃篝火晚会，住蒙古包。

sent.orig: Good evening, Mr. Bush. How are you this evening?
sent.trans: 晚上好，Bush先生，今晚过得怎么样？
